mapper.sql: CONTRACT_NO, DOMAIN, PAYMENT_PERIOD, LEASE_PAY_BEGIN_DATE, LEASE_VALID_BEGIN_DATE, LEASE_VALID_END_DATE, SUSPEND_BEGIN_DATE, SUSPEND_END_DATE, OP_PAY_BEGIN_DATE, OLD_CONTRACT_NO, NEXT_YEAR_MONTH, CR_USER, CR_TIME, MD_USER, MD_TIME, LEASE_STATUS

select
distinct
from TB_PAY_CONTRACT_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_PAY_CONTRACT_INFO (CONTRACT_NO, DOMAIN, PAYMENT_PERIOD, LEASE_PAY_BEGIN_DATE, LEASE_VALID_BEGIN_DATE, LEASE_VALID_END_DATE, SUSPEND_BEGIN_DATE, SUSPEND_END_DATE, OP_PAY_BEGIN_DATE, OLD_CONTRACT_NO, NEXT_YEAR_MONTH, CR_USER, CR_TIME, MD_USER, MD_TIME, LEASE_STATUS) values (#{CONTRACT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PAYMENT_PERIOD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LEASE_PAY_BEGIN_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{LEASE_VALID_BEGIN_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{LEASE_VALID_END_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{SUSPEND_BEGIN_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{SUSPEND_END_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{OP_PAY_BEGIN_DATE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OLD_CONTRACT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NEXT_YEAR_MONTH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{LEASE_STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

LEASE_PAY_BEGIN_DATE = #{LEASE_PAY_BEGIN_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

MD_USER = #{MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where CONTRACT_NO = #{CONTRACT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DOMAIN = #{DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
